content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5), boiler (position 0.5, 6.0), and pipe groups (various positions).

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0)
- Assembling machine at position (not specified) and inserter (not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Belt group (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -5.0, -65.0 to the assembling machine (position not specified)

### Wooden chests
- Wooden chest (position 46.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest (position 48.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest (position 10.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest (position -4.5, -63.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing pipes
- Ensure to have pipes in inventory before attempting to connect the boiler to the steam engine.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
